articles.author: Ian Randall
articles.title: NASA experts left baffled after spotting bizarre object stuck to foot of Mars helicopter - Express
articles.description: The space agency is unsure what the object - which was dislodged mid-flight - was, but some have speculated it could have been a piece of fabric from the Wright brothers' historic aircraft which was attached to the rotorcraft before being sent to Mars.
